ccode.description: Country code for the phone number (without the '+')

fr.description: Shop's audio record as publisher on M+. Add field like this one for each language provided. When no language is defined, just create the 'fr' field

id.description: Audio file's id in the flystore/files table

key.description: Audio file's key in the flystore/files table

has-logo.description: Whether the logo is set or not

profile.description: id of the logo entry id in the flystore/files table (profile ratio: 1:1)

logo-key.description: key of the logo entry key in the flystore/files table

has-cover.description: Whether the cover pic is set or not

cover.description: id of the cover picture entry id in the flystore/files table (cover ratio: 16:9 landscape)

cover-key.description: key of the cover picture entry key in the flystore/files table

notes.description: list of the current notes for this shop

followers: Just provide empty square braces as value
following: Just provide empty square braces as value

shop-number.description: unique number assigned to each shop (`${creation_timestamp}s${id_to decimal}`)

city.description: User's current city (id of the city)

state.description: User's current state (id of the state)

country.description: User's current country (id of the country)
